name: Minuscule
description:
Adventure yourself in a tiny world! Help a little spider finding his web.

Minuscule is a little game made in about 1 week. 

CONTROLS:

<> or AD to move

SPACE to jump

Right Mouse Button to shoot web

Game is still in development, any bug report will be helpful. Currently there are only 3 levels; new levels will be added once a week.

Report any bug in the comments.
